Texts.Chs:
作为猎物的历史，已使这些高度进化的啮齿生物成为弱者和被压制者的保护者。

^orange;食性^reset;：杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:

^orange;增益^reset;:
饥饿速度^green;-25^reset;%
抗性：寒冷抗性^green;+30^reset;%，毒素抗性^green;+30^reset;%，射线抗性^green;+30^reset;%
免疫：中毒，蜂蛰

^orange;武器^reset;:
单手武器连击时：增加防御
刺剑，短剑，锤矛：伤害^green;+10^reset;%，暴击几率^green;+0.25^reset;%
刺剑，匕首：防御^green;+25^reset;%

^red;弱点^reset;:
抗性：电系抗性^red;-30^reset;%，暗影抗性^red;-30^reset;%，辐射抗性^red;-30^reset;%
Texts.Eng:
A history as a prey-animal has led these now highly evolved rodents to become protectors of the weak and downtrodden.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Ice, Poison and Cosmic
  -^green;25^reset;% Hunger Drain
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Poison, Bee Stings

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  1h combos increase Defense
  Rapier/Shortsword/Mace: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;0.25^reset;% Crit Chance
  Rapier+Dagger: Defense x^green;1.25^reset;
  Rapier: +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance when over 25% Energy

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Electric, Shadow, Radiation
